snippet.title: Castle Of Alchemists - Trailer
snippet.description:
Castle Of Alchemists is a hybrid of tower defense and top-down action game. 

You are playing as the alchemically enhanced super soldier that is one of its kind: Bellator. The task is clear. You'll fight against invaders in the castle and reclaim your ground piece by piece. 

Check out our game Castle Of Alchemists on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1724770/Castle_Of_Alchemists/

Follow us on social media, join our discord channel:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TeamMachiavelli
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TeamMachiavelli
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/teammachiavelli/
Discord: https://discord.gg/2cFMeDMr


#castleofalchemists #game #indiegame #gamedev #gamedevelopment #steam
